metadata.title: CVE-2024-36587 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Insecure permissions in DNSCrypt-proxy v2.0.0alpha9 to v2.1.5 allowsnon-privileged attackers to escalate privileges to root via overwriting thebinary dnscrypt-proxy.

criterions.comment: dnscrypt-proxy package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
